name: DarceyQuest
description:
I made this PICO-8 game for my girlfriend for Valentines Day 2018. The idea was for her to collect as many hearts as possible and the amount at the end corresponded to a gift. The more hearts the better the gift! I took out a slightly longer sappier message at the beginning of the game before uploading here (too embarrassing).  Getting all 18 hearts is harder than you might think. 

TOP TIP:  

Sliding gives you more speed and a longer jump!
